channel.title: Causing me to never host again! HELP!
channel.description:
When i try to run my client, or open runserver (itl say this somtimes for the runserver)
" 'java' is not recognized as an internet or external command operable program or batch file." Press any key to continue . . .
I tryed following Mod Tahorks ( eek, probbly spelled wrong ) tutorial on the perfect server or somthing, where i had to go into enviornmental somthing, and i changed two things in there. Before i changed this, it was working fine ( i have reason to believe this is whats stopping this from working. )
How am I supposed to change them back? What used to be there before i changed them ( I should have backed them up :( )

item.title: Causing me to never host again! HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Nics Nics
item.description:
@Nics wrote:

I cant find Java 10. I checked Java.com and http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp, Is there a specific link? Either of these sites have “Java 10”.

Read full topic
